intro: Monotes autennei, commonly known as the African snowball, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Proteaceae family and is characterized by its spherical clusters of white, fluffy flowers. The plant has a woody stem and is often cultivated for its ornamental value. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires full sun to partial shade. Monotes autennei is a perennial shrub that blooms in spring and early summer.
